title: Best aram composition?
body: Rito pls, mercy on enemy teams soul.

replies.body:
RIP

Well, Ori, Yasuo, Malphite, Sejuani and Katarina would work better, but I don't see it popping up anytime soon

Sejuani initiates with her "ranged AoE stun" (totally balanced), Ori puts her balls on Mal, Mal ults in, Ori ults, Yasuo ults, Kat jumps in, *all hehl breks loohse *

> [{quoted}](name=Strider Hiryu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7uE5LhO7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-12T05:56:54.558+0000)
> RIP
> 
> Well, Ori, Yasuo, Malphite, Sejuani and Katarina would work better, but I don't see it popping up anytime soon
> 
> Sejuani initiates with her "ranged AoE stun" (totally balanced), Ori puts her balls on Mal, Mal ults in, Ori ults, Yasuo ults, Kat jumps in, *all hehl breks loohse *

*Kat jumps in after sej stun, ults right through their wombo combo
that is what cancer looks like
